QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server%'

BasicSettings.Name: All Servers

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ResourceId not in (select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_R_System.IsVirtualMachine = 'True') and SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT%Server%'

BasicSettings.Comment: All physical servers
BasicSettings.Name: SRV - INV - Physical

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.IsVirtualMachine = 'True' and SMS_R_System.OperatingSystemNameandVersion like 'Microsoft Windows NT%Server%'

BasicSettings.Comment: All virtual servers
BasicSettings.Name: SRV - INV - Virtual

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 6.0%' or OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 6.1%'

BasicSettings.Comment: All servers with Windows 2008 or 2008 R2 operating system
BasicSettings.Name: SRV - INV - Windows 2008 and 2008 R2

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 6.2%' or OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 6.3%'

BasicSettings.Comment: All servers with Windows 2012 or 2012 R2 operating system
BasicSettings.Name: SRV - INV - Windows 2012 and 2012 R2

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 5.2%'

BasicSettings.Comment: All servers with Windows 2003 or 2003 R2 operating system
BasicSettings.Name: SRV - INV - Windows 2003 and 2003 R2

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Server 10%'

BasicSettings.Comment: All servers with Windows 2016
BasicSettings.Name: SRV - INV - Windows 2016

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 6.1%'

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 6.2%'

BasicSettings.Comment: All workstations with Windows 8 operating system
BasicSettings.Name: WKS - INV - Windows 8

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_System.ResourceID,SMS_R_System.ResourceType,SMS_R_System.Name,SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 6.3%'

BasicSettings.Comment: All workstations with Windows 8.1 operating system
BasicSettings.Name: WKS - INV - Windows 8.1

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System   where OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 5.1%' or OperatingSystemNameandVersion like '%Workstation 5.2%'

BasicSettings.Name: WKS - INV - Windows XP

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS on SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.ResourceID = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_ADD_REMOVE_PROGRAMS.DisplayName like '%Configuration Manager Console%'

BasicSettings.Comment: All systems with SCCM console installed
BasicSettings.Name: WKS - INV - SCCM Console

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System where SMS_R_System.ClientVersion like '5.00.8577.100%'

BasicSettings.Comment: SCCM client version 1710
BasicSettings.Name: WKS - INV - Clients Version | 1710

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%Dell%'

BasicSettings.Comment: All Dell Laptops
BasicSettings.Name: WKS - INV - Laptops | Dell

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%Lenovo%'

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceID,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceType,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Name,SMS_R_SYSTEM.SMSUniqueIdentifier,SMS_R_SYSTEM.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup,SMS_R_SYSTEM.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%HP%' or SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Manufacturer like '%Hewlett-Packard%'

QueryMembershipRules.QueryExpression: select SMS_R_System.ResourceId, SMS_R_System.ResourceType, SMS_R_System.Name, SMS_R_System.SMSUniqueIdentifier, SMS_R_System.ResourceDomainORWorkgroup, SMS_R_System.Client from SMS_R_System inner join SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM on SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.ResourceId = SMS_R_System.ResourceId where SMS_G_System_COMPUTER_SYSTEM.Model = 'Surface Pro 4'
